sentences.sContent: Papa flicked the ash from his cigar.
sentences.sCn: 爸爸弹去雪茄上的烟灰。

words.tran: 闪烁的，忽隐忽现的；摇曳的
闪烁；摇曳；颤动；扑动翅膀；假装昏倒

trans.tranCn: 轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去
trans.tranOther: to make something move away by hitting or pushing it suddenly or quickly, especially with your thumb and finger

trans.tranCn: 弹开；快速的轻打；轻打声
trans.tranOther: a short quick sudden movement or hit with a part of your body, whip etc
